text:
‘Craig no longer James Bond’

The confusion over Daniel Craig staying on for another James Bond film intensified, when his good friend, actor Mark Strong, said that Craig might shed his tuxedo.

When asked whether he’d be up for playing a villain in a 007 film, Strong said that he would have done it if Craig would have played Bond, “but I think he’s come to the end of his Bond time,” reports the Independent . — ANI
title: Daniel Craig is shedding James Bond tuxedo, confirms Mark Strong
